title: Special topic credits
content: How many credits should we have to get from special topics/ summer courses?

comments.body:
Just a note: the norm is to indicate your *graduating* year, not your incoming year (that's why people say "batch of 2022", which means the batch that graduated in 2022). You could also be specific and say 2022 incoming batch. 

Just pointing it out so that others reading this later have better clarity, because it can cause confusion.
